name: Totally Pyramid Solitaire! Classic Card Game
name_original: Totally Pyramid Solitaire! Classic Card Game
description:
Boy Howdy's Pyramid Solitaire is the best Pyramid Solitaire app ever, and it's 100% FREE!

• Pyramid is a classic solitaire game where you make pairs that add up to 13 in order to clear the pyramid of cards from the board.

• Fast and intuitive controls - Just tap on a pair of cards to remove them!
• Beautiful, easy to read cards!

• No timers at all! Just relax and have fun!
• Unlimited undo support, with no penalties if you want to go back and try things a different way!

• 3 different Game Modes to keep things interesting!
• Fun Mode deals out 3 cards at a time and you can use any of them to make matches
• Hard Mode deals out 3 cards at a time in a stack and you can only use the top one
• Strategy Mode deals out all the cards at the beginning of the game, in 8 stacks of 3, so you can see everything ahead of time and think carefully to make the matches you need

• Global high score leaderboards with Game Center
• Your progress is automatically saved, all the time, so go ahead and take that call or jump out to any other apps - you can come back and pick up playing right where you left off!

• Sounds can be disabled if you want a quiet game
• You can even listen to your own music while you play

Thanks for playing!
